metadata.synopsis: Patiens has no tongue or eyes. If you release him he produces some sounds, walks a couple of feet and dies from blood loss.
metadata.how_to_trigger: SCL_Main_Agoto -199; 27; 44Use "Attack" button in the dialog and kill the surgeon and the nurses.Talk to the patient.

0.speaker: Distressed Patient
0.context: NodeContext: Gurgling - tongue has been torn out
